title: What Americans die from vs. what the news reports on
author: alphabetatango
aiHeadline: The news is more interested in sensational stories than the actual causes of death, proving once again that clickbait trumps reality.

title: New York Times, AP, Newsmax and others say they won't sign new Pentagon rules
author: baobun
aiHeadline: Major news outlets are rebelling against Pentagon rules, showing that even in the age of information warfare, some lines shouldn't be crossed.

title: Surveillance data challenges what we thought we knew about location tracking
author: _tk_
aiHeadline: Your location data is being used against you, and we just found out we knew nothing about how it's done.

title: Why the push for Agentic when models can barely follow a simple instruction?
author: fork-bomber
aiHeadline: AI models are supposed to be smart, but they can't even follow a simple instruction, yet we're pushing for more autonomy. Go figure.
